creator: Jerome.Lovy@infonie.de
text:
HTML file
webapps/tomcat-docs/class-loader-howto.html
typically found in jakarta-tomcat-4.0.1.tar.gz gives information about included
jar files made available by the different class loaders.
The information given here doesn't match what comes in the distribution.
For example:
(System):
        DOC: lib/bootstrap.jar  DISTRIB: bin/bootstrap.jar
(Common):
        DOC: naming.jar         DISTRIB: naming-common.jar (?)
        DOC: resources.jar      DISTRIB: naming-resources.jar (?)
        DOC: no mention of      DISTRIB: xerces.jar, activation.jar ...
(Catalina)
        DOC: crimson.jar        DISTRIB: not found
        DOC: jaxp.jar           DISTRIB: not found
(Miscellaneous places)
        DOC: $CATALINA_HOME/jasper     DISTRIB: not found
